item.description:
I'm interested in organizing a TMRICE team for this year's 5K4Life, which raises funds for ALS (Lou Gehrig's Disease) research. My grad school advisor is involved in ALS research, motivated by the loss of his sister to the disease. The flat and fast course starts and finishes at Galileo Way and Binney Street near MIT, going up Broadway to Ellery Street and returning down Harvard Street. Features chip timing, finisher medals, food & beverages (there was beer last year).

When you sign up at active.com, write "TMIRCE" in the space for club/team.  If you missed this step, contact the race organizers here: http://www.5k4life.org/page/contacts

Day-of-race:  I plan to tape a TMIRCE poster to a tree to designate our meeting place.  

 Thanks!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 3rd Annual 5K4Life Road Race: Sunday, Nov. 6
